授業目的:
The purpose of this course is for students to develop English listening,
 reading, speaking, and writing skills, in addition to learning new 
vocabulary, all while working in an all-English communicative 
atmosphere.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. write brief reports on various topics.
2. deliver brief presentations on various topics.
3. learn and operate in an all-English classroom environment.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on topics in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour outside of class each week on homework.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Keynote 2 by David Bohlke published by Cengage.
授業コード/Class code0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【200】インテンシブ・イングリッシュ　５９／Intensive English
